body:
Hi everybody, 

I'm doing a project about optimizing a house and I did some simulations in order to set the optimum glaze ratio and orientations of the house in order to have the minimum energy consumption (heating+light). Now I was trying to see how the construction materials have influence on those outputs, and I was wondering what is the pre-set material of a Madrise Apartement Zone, because when I put some isolation materials as walls, then the heating consumption increases instead of decreasing. Here I upload the file.

replies.body: Hi Axel, Default construction doesn't change based on program. Here is the list of the default construction and you can use deconstruct construction and then deconstruct material to see the details. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/yzyZivDfL*nght5V3devI0ACtRA9q0cfRZtX-10ZuKg1BhJQmZNF0GVIMKfV076vCaiJmrGQQkyem6bpM6572nS1xj1xDqWr/deconstruct_construction.png)
